Cashew_anthracnose: Kashuu Tuntum wei ma Kashuu no nhaban ne n'adua so yɛ tuntum. Yareɛ mmoawa bi a ɛte sɛ sradedɛ (fɔngɔs) na ɛde ba. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wosi ano a, twa afa horoɔ a ayare no, na pɛtɛ nnuro gu so ntɛm.

Cashew_gumosis: Wei ma dua mu nsuo firi mu ba abɔnten. Sɛ dua no pira anaa yareɛ bi kɔ mu a, na ɛba. Mma dua no mpira na fa nnuro a ɛfata sa yareɛ no.

Cashew_healthy: Wei kyerɛ sɛ dua no yɛ kama na yareɛ biara nni ho. Di afuo no mu nni, ma no nya kwan, na kɔhwɛ nnua no mpɛn pii.

Cashew_leaf_miner: Ɛyɛ ɔmoa ketewa bi a ɔtutu kwan wɔ ahaban no mu, na ɛgya nsensaneeɛ. Yi nhaban a asɛe no na fa nnuro a yɛde nnua ayɛ siw ano.

Cashew_red_rust: Wei yɛ te sɛ powder kɔkɔɔ a ɛgu nhaban ne dua no ntini so. Yareɛ mmoawa (fɔngɔs) bi na ɛde ba. Ma nnua no nya baabi a mframa bɛfa, na pɛtɛ nnuro gu so sɛ ɛho hia a.

Cassava_bacterial_blight: Wei ma nhaban no hyehye na dua no wu. Yareɛ mmoawa na ɛde ba. Fa nnuaa a ɛho te dua, na dua ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ ahoɔden.

Cassava_brown_spot: Wei ma bankye nhaban no so yɛ nsensɛnsoɔ kotofa. Yareɛ mmoawa (fɔngɔs) na ɛde ba. Hye nhaban a ayare no, na sesa baabi a wudua no mpɛn pii.

Cassava_green_mite: Wei ma nhaban no moamoa na ɛdane akokɔsradeɛ. Mmoa nketenkete na ɛyɛ saa. Dua bankye a ɛho yɛ den na ma mmoa a wɔboa no nwe saa mmoa bɔne yi.

Cassava_healthy: Wei kyerɛ sɛ dua no renyini yie. Fa nnua a ɛho te dua, mma wɔmmɛn wɔn ho dodo, na sesa faako a wudua no afe biara.

Cassava_mosaic: Wei ma akokɔsradeɛ eba bankye no nhaban no so. Yareɛ mmoawa (vayrɔs) a nwansena na ɛde trɛ na ɛde ba. Fa bankye nnuaa a ɛho te dua na siw nwansena no ano.

Maize_fall_armyworm: Ɔwe aburoo no nhaban, na ɛma ntokuro ba ahaban no mu. Di kan hwɛ na fa nnuro a yɛde nnua ayɛ pete gu so.

Maize_grasshopper: Wei, Odi nhaban no na ɛma dua no brɛ ase. Yi wɔn ntɛm na pete nnuro a ɛnsɛe nnɔbaeɛ gu so.

Maize_healthy: Wei kyerɛ sɛ aburoo no renyini yie. Fa asase pa dua, dua no ɛberɛ a ɛsɛ mu, na yiyi nwura no.

Maize_leaf_beetle: Mmoa yi we nhaban no, na ɛma ntokuro ba ahaban no mu. Fa afidie yi wɔn na dua aburoo ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ mu.

Maize_leaf_blight: Wei ma aburoo nhaban no so hyehye. Yareɛ mmoawa (fɔngɔs) na ɛde ba. Yi nnua a ɛnyɛ no, na pete nnuro gu afuo no so ntɛm.

Maize_leaf_spot: Wei ma nsensɛnsoɔ tuntum nketenkete ba nhaban no so. Yareɛ mmoawa na ɛde ba. Tutu nnua a asɛe no na pete nnuro gu afuo no so.

Maize_streak_virus: Wei de nsensanee akɔnkɔn ba nhaban no so na ɛmma ennyini yie. Mmoa nketenkete na ɛde trɛ. Fa aba a ɛyɛ den dua na bɔ ho ban firi mmoa ho.

Tomato_healthy: Wei kyerɛ sɛ dua no yɛ kama. Gugu no nsuo yie, ma kwan nna mu, na kɔhwɛ no mpɛn pii.

Tomato_leaf_blight: Wei ma nhaban no dane akokɔsradeɛ ne dodoeɛ. Yareɛ mmoawa (fɔngɔs) na ɛde ba. Mma nsuo nka nhaban no na pete nnuro gu so sɛ ɛho hia a.

Tomato_leaf_curl: Wei ma nhaban no moamoa na dua no nnyini. Yareɛ mmoawa (vayrɔs) a nwansena de trɛ na ɛde ba. Fa asau kataso na dua aba a ɛho yɛ den.

Tomato_septoria_leaf_spot: Wei ma nsensɛnsoɔ tuntum nketenkete a n'ahyea so yɛ akokɔsradeɛ ba nhaban no so. Yareɛ mmoawa (fɔngɔs) na ɛde ba. Yi nhaban a asɛe no na ma no kwan.

Tomato_verticulium_wilt: Wei ma dua no brɛ ase na ɛfiri fam dane akokɔsradeɛ. Efiri asase no mu na ɛba. Fa aba a ɛho yɛ den dua na sesa faako a wudua no.
